com.redhat.rhn.common.localization

Class XmlResourceBundle

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.ResourceBundle
      • com.redhat.rhn.common.localization.XmlResourceBundle

  • public final class XmlResourceBundle
extends java.util.ResourceBundle
    Class that extends the java.util.ResourceBundle class that stores the strings in an XML format similar to a property file. The format is as follows: Get this one arg: {0} two arg: {0} {1} three arg: {0} {1} {2} Where the bundle gets built with the keys being the "id" attribute of the XML tag and the values being contained within the value of the tag itself. Message substitution is supported.
